trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Chico
There were no other sightings in Chico on or around December 9th 1980
divs: sighting detailsone night on a trip to canada from san diego, in northern cali. i was in a sleeping bag starring up at the "seven sisters" star cluster. other wise known as pleates or the subaru emblem. i was intent on counting the seven stars as my vision was 10\20 at the time and i always liked using my excellent vision to the max.. i was counting and would get 6 then 8 then while starring at the cluster of stars a swirl or white started towards me from the cluster.spiraling towards me on the ground. i blinked a few times and then in a matter of 3-4 minutes the sparkely fuckers were pulsating around me. i was petrifyed and only assume they were behind me. i saw many of the sparkles infront of me. i shouted at them "good is better than evil ..get the "f" out of here!!! then in a fraction of a second whoosh they all grouped together and spiraled up and away faster than i can explain. i hate typing so call if you want. i am done with this form.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: sparkly,seemed to have a pulse, SWERLED DOWN FROM PLEATIS..
